metadata.title: CVE-2023-39418 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in PostgreSQL with the use of the MERGE command,which fails to test new rows against row security policies defined forUPDATE and SELECT. If UPDATE and SELECT policies forbid some rows thatINSERT policies do not forbid, a user could store such rows.

criterions.comment: postgresql-9.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
